description: I'm really addicted to it. There are puzzles enough to keep you busy for a while!
summary: Great collection of creative puzzle games

description: i like it .realy good games. and enough to keep you busy for a while
Dozens of puzzles to choose from, and a simple but clear interface. You're sure to find something you love.
Keeps flickering and generates new instances of opened game. Check system moniter and watch the instances being born. Had to kill about 50 instances.
summary: Kept opening new instances of game

description:
very handy, but I loose some options: if I go to NET game through launcher (that's just an example): unable to change size or find Help or Exit command (to go back to launcher without closing it).
please tell me how to have those menus!
